name: Course 1: Precalculus

lo: MA03: Demonstrating and understanding of matrices and solving systems using matrix equations.

lo: MA05: Classifying conic equations and constructing graphs of conic sections.

name: Courses 5: Physics 1
lo: PH01: Understand the concepts, laws, and principles used in mechanics and generate associations
